overview: Get the rave going with this groove-setting, continuous-play party video that turns the entire room into a giant lava lamp. Burbling lava lamp visuals are rhythmically matched to a soundtrack of the hippest trance/dance tunes. Your guests won't be able to resist grooving to the hypnotic beats, bubbling shapes and groovy colors. The light show displays at optimum on larger screens.
title: Lava Party Light  Show
